title: Science Education Simulation Design Utilizing ChatGPT

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational science theory, specialized job experience, and understanding of basic AI concepts
context.additional_context: Customized science education design combining VR simulations and ChatGPT in BYOD environments

learning_goals: Learners can explain complex scientific concepts in simulated environments using ChatGPT
Learners can improve problem-solving efficiency by 30% using ChatGPT as an auxiliary tool when designing VR-based science experiments
Learners can critically analyze ChatGPT outputs by applying evaluation criteria for AI tool transparency and data reliability
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
